Description:
Location Meets Lifestyle
This well-designed two-bedroom apartment is situated in one of Melbournes most affluent suburbs. With the infamous Chapel Street at your door step, you can wine and dine your way through an array of bars, restaurants and cafes!
Warm and inviting, this apartment features an open plan layout that bursts with natural light! Providing ample room to relax or entertain. Sit back and enjoy a breathe of fresh air from your very own spacious balcony, accessible from both living area and master bedroom. Functional, modern kitchen is equipped with stainless-steel appliances of the highest calibre (Miele) incl. an integrated dishwasher and substantial cupboard space. Additional features include sizeable light filled bedrooms with plush carpeting and built-in robes, fully tiled designer bathroom, central heating/cooling, secure video intercom entry and car space.
Only a short stroll from the Jam Factory, public transport incl. South Yarra Station, stylish boutiques, supermarkets, expansive parklands and the renowned Toorak Road, this apartment has been tailored for effortless, cosmopolitan living.

Gymnasium

Description:
SOUTH YARRA PENTHOUSE
4 beds, 5 baths, 9 cars and a pool
Combining the architectural genius of Plus Architecture and Rothe Lowman with interiors by award-winning Mim Design, this spectacular penthouse in the heart of South Yarra has mesmerising views of the city skyline that captures the world's most liveable city in all its glory.
Sophisticated, stylish and spacious, the penthouse provides approx. 600 sqm of flawlessly designed indoor and outdoor spaces for the ultimate in elegant inner- city living.
This unique opportunity at the pinnacle of design comprises four bedrooms, five bathrooms, each with ensuites and walk-in robes.
The penthouse which recently featured in Belle magazines Smart Spaces, includes a fully fitted bar, adults retreat and formal and informal living zones for flexible entertaining.
Meticulous joinery, custom lighting, fine timbers, bespoke finishes and the attention to detail for which Mim Design is famous are evident throughout.
The magnificent marble kitchen and open plan living area, framed by walls of glass, overlook a private plunge pool. The kitchen and butlers pantry serve in style with Miele cooking appliances that include two ovens, steam oven, dishwasher, integrated fridge/freezer, induction cook top plus Subzero integrated wine fridge and Qasair range hood.
A den or 'adults retreat' has a built-in custom wine and beer fridge and ice maker plus Miele dishwasher.
Flooded with natural light, this fully automated residence creates a truly memorable environment that is only accentuated by the long list of features that add to its amenity.
From Sonos speakers in all main rooms, wall-mounted TVs in three bedrooms, surround sound systems, i-pad control, keypad entry to apartment, carpark and garage door to basement storage, C-bus lighting, automatic blinds and one push lighting, and secure garaging for nine cars, this is a rare opportunity to have it all.
